title: Dragon Fire Esports - Gaming Focus Supplement | Advanced Nootropic Formula for Gamers | Enhance Reaction Time, Mental Clarity & Concentration | Energy & Focus Booster - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Dragon Fire Esports - Elite Gaming Performance Formula

Dominate your game with Dragon Fire Esports Advanced Focus Formula, a cutting-edge nootropic supplement designed specifically for gamers and esports athletes. Our scientifically-formulated blend enhances mental clarity, reaction time, focus, and sustained energy to give you the competitive edge you need to perform at your peak.

Key Benefits for Gamers

  • Enhanced Focus & Concentration: Stay locked in during long gaming sessions without mental fatigue
  • Improved Reaction Time: Faster cognitive processing for split-second decisions
  • Mental Clarity & Alertness: Nootropic blend supports clear thinking and strategic gameplay
  • Sustained Energy: Clean energy without jitters or crashes
  • Reduced Mental Fatigue: Maintain peak performance during extended gaming sessions
  • Memory & Learning: Better recall of game mechanics and strategies

Performance-Enhancing Ingredients

  • Caffeine: Provides clean energy and enhanced alertness for optimal gaming performance
  • L-Theanine: Works synergistically with caffeine for calm focus without jitters
  • Alpha-GPC: Supports acetylcholine production for improved memory and cognitive function
  • Bacopa Monnieri: Enhances memory formation and cognitive processing speed
  • Rhodiola Rosea: Adaptogen that reduces mental fatigue and supports stress resilience
  • Lion's Mane Mushroom: Supports brain health and cognitive function
  • B-Vitamin Complex: Supports energy metabolism and neurotransmitter production
  • Ginkgo Biloba: Enhances blood flow to the brain for improved focus and mental clarity

Perfect For

  • Professional esports athletes
  • Competitive gamers
  • Streamers and content creators
  • Tournament players
  • Anyone seeking enhanced gaming performance

Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules 30-45 minutes before gaming for optimal performance. Do not exceed recommended dosage.

Quality Assurance: Formulated for peak gaming performance. No banned substances. Third-party tested.
shortDescriptionHtml: Level up your gaming performance with Dragon Fire Esports. Advanced nootropic formula enhances focus, reaction time, mental clarity, and sustained energy for competitive gaming. Perfect for esports athletes and streamers. 60 capsules.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 1 Capsule
Servings Per Container: 60

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Energy Blend 450 mg **
Caffeine, Phenylethylamine HCl, Glucomannan, Fursultiamine, L-Tyrosine
Thermogenic Focus Blend 40 mg **
Green Tea Extract (min. 50% EGCG, min. 98% Polyphenols) (leaf), Raspberry Ketones, Yohimbe bark
Endurance Blend 7 mg **
Kola Nut, L-Carnitine

** Daily Value (DV) not Established

Other Ingredients: Gelatin, Rice Flour, Magnesium Stearate, Silicon Dioxide, FD&C Red #40 & Titanium Dioxide.
